markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual-Weapon Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=6309) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 196 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247)

**Prerequisites**
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6307)

</column>

---

You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons. While you're wielding two one-handed weapons, each in a different hand, you don't need a free hand to reload a one-handed ranged weapon you're wielding.
name: Dual-Weapon Reload
